Package com.stasroshchenko.diploma.controller

Class VisitController

java.lang.Object
com.stasroshchenko.diploma.controller.VisitController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/visit") public class VisitController extends Object
Works with all the POST requests incoming in "localhost:8080/visit".
Version:
1.0
Author:
staffsterr2000

  • Method Details

    • sendVisit

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_CLIENT\')") @PostMapping("/send") public String sendVisit​(@RequestParam("redirectLink") String redirectLink, @Valid @ModelAttribute("sendRequest") @Valid SendVisitRequest request, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      If request has no validation and binding errors, and user authorized as a client user, the method tries to send the request to service and to redirect user back to the previous page.
      Parameters:
      redirectLink - previous link to redirect later
      request - the filled-by-client-user SEND visit request, which is validated
      result - result of validation and binding (contains errors)
      redirectAttributes - attributes that will be redirected to next view
      authentication - current user's authentication
      Returns:
      link where user will be redirected
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      SendVisitRequest

    • passVisit

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_DOCTOR\')") @PostMapping("/pass") public String passVisit​(@RequestParam("redirectLink") String redirectLink, @RequestParam("status") VisitStatus status, @Valid @ModelAttribute("passRequest") @Valid PassVisitRequest request, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      If request has no validation and binding errors, and user authorized as a doctor user, the method tries to send the request to service and to redirect user back to the previous page.
      Parameters:
      redirectLink - previous link to redirect later
      status - new visit status that user want to change certain visit's status to
      request - the filled-by-doctor-user PASS visit request, which is validated
      result - result of validation and binding (contains errors)
      redirectAttributes - attributes that will be redirected to next view
      authentication - current user's authentication
      Returns:
      link where user will be redirected
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      PassVisitRequest
